title: Distributed Cryptographic System for Immutable Defensive Publication
raw_concept: A computerized method using distributed version control (Git), automated continuous integration pipelines, and third-party Digital Object Identifier (DOI) repositories (Zenodo) to cryptographically timestamp and publicly disseminate technical disclosures. This system automates the generation of bilingual (English/Spanish) prior art documents from raw input using Large Language Models (LLMs), ensuring compliance with USPTO and IMPI novelty-destroying standards.

title: SAT Blacklist Monitor v1.1
raw_concept: An automated system that polls the SAT (Tax Authority) 69-B API/List daily, normalizes the data, and runs a cross-reference match against an enterprise's vendor list to flag non-deductible fiscal risks in real-time.

title: Dummy Test Idea for Automation
raw_concept: A dummy concept to test the end-to-end automated publication pipeline.
